General.Name: Local World Forwarders
General.Description: Local World Forwarders (LWF) is a DPoS cryptocurrency based on the DPoS algorithm. The LWF team aims to build a multi-service logistics platform capable of decentralizing all information currently held within the traditional logistics systems. The DPoS-based blockchain will allow processing information about shipments, feedback, freight forwarders, media management, and shipping status in a scalable and secure environment.

ICO.Description:
Local World Forwarders (LWF) is a DPoS cryptocurrency based on the DPoS algorithm. The LWF team aims to build a multi-service logistics platform capable of decentralizing all information currently held within the traditional logistics systems. The DPoS-based blockchain will allow processing information about shipments, feedback, freight forwarders, media management, and shipping status in a scalable and secure environment.

Team:

  • Angelo Melis: Founder and Head of the Project. 
  • Fabio Legrenzi: Co-Founder.
  • Stefano Gessa: CTO.
  • Davide Puddu: Frontend Developer. 
  • Roberto Randine: Art Director, User Interface. 
  • Domenico Birardi: Blockchain Expert. 

Local World Forwarders will be holding its ICO on the 23rd of January, 2018. The ICO token supply represents 73.33% of the total token supply, so there will be a total of 73,333,800 tokens available. The ICO funding target is 50 BTC, the funding cap is 2000 BTC and is expected to end on the 23rd of February, 2018 or when the funding cap is reached.

Token Reserve Split (26.67%):

  • 5% Advisors;
  • 5% Devel./Marketing;
  • 5% Team Bonus;
  • 7% Bounty;
  • 4.67% Pre-Sale;

Local World Forwarders ICO will feature a bounty campaign and a bonus program, and the token will not be mineable.

Bonus Structure:

  • 20% until January 26 12:00 GMT;
  • 18% until February 1 12:00 GMT;
  • 15% until February 6 12:00 GMT;
  • 13% until February 10 12:00 GMT;
  • 10% until February 18 12:00 GMT;
  • 5% until February 23 12:00 GMT;
